description: This file defines an API route for authentication, specifically a mock login endpoint used for development/testing. It uses FastAPI to define the endpoint, interacts with a SQLite database, and references functions and models for user upsertion and token signing.

methods.name: TokenResponse mock_login(payload: MockLoginRequest, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db_conn))
methods.description: Endpoint function that handles mock login requests, upserts the user, generates a token, and handles exceptions.

ctags.name: mock_login
ctags.pattern: /^def mock_login(payload: MockLoginRequest, db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db_conn)) -> Toke/
